title: 01: S6E01 – "Evidence of Evil" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you six terrifying tales from authors William Dalphin, Michael Paige, Seth Paul, and W.C. Morrow, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about Halloween night horrors, phantasmal flames, dreadful discoveries, upstairs entities, disturbing disappearances, and righteous revenge.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
